name: Dailysentences
0:
”Alexa, ask daily sentences to give me today's proverb”
”give me one”
”give me todays sentence”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily sentences
des:
Activate the skill by 'daily sentence'
Using one of phrases': 'daily sentence'
'today proverb'
'give me todays sentence'
'give me one'
'give me daily sentence' will provide your Daily Sentence!

Doesn't require any special prerequisistes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
